testsuite.name: org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.SameShardRoutingTests
testsuite.system-out: [2020-02-16T22:20:39,445][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testForceAllocatePrimaryOnSameNodeNotAllowed] before test [2020-02-16T22:20:39,447][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testForceAllocatePrimaryOnSameNodeNotAllowed] after test [2020-02-16T22:20:39,456][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testSameHost] before test [2020-02-16T22:20:39,457][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testSameHost] --> adding two nodes with the same host [2020-02-16T22:20:39,458][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testSameHost] --> start all primary shards, no replica will be started since its on the same host [2020-02-16T22:20:39,459][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testSameHost] --> add another node, with a different host, replicas will be allocating [2020-02-16T22:20:39,459][INFO ][o.e.c.r.a.SameShardRoutingTests] [testSameHost] after test
